channel.title: New Coder Needs Noobish Help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm new to coding and I just need a bit of help.
The things I need help with are -You keep Firecape when you get killed by another player or npc -Changing the Text on the teleport symbols - Fixed -Getting rid of text in emote tab - Fixed -Making 2h weapons can't use shield -Timers for my mage - Hopefully it will work on pvp -Maul spec hits as soon as you click special bar -Getting My teleports to work
[img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/9113/codinghelpgj6.jpg[/img]
My mage timers need to be slowed down.
I need some set by step code to keep firecape in inventory or kept equiped when somebody dies.
I'll check back later. Night guys!

item.description:

[/quote]
Dont Hijack. Thanks for this.

EDIT::The only one I could find was Home. I found the other commands deleted them but the text is still there.[/quote]

Search the name of the other emotes and delete the name of it.Then compile.Tell me if you want me to do it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: New Coder Needs Noobish Help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

In client.java search

Home

or

@blu@Home

And delete it.
Underneath that you should see the rest of the emotes.Just delete them.I’m just working out on the rest so i’ll edit in a sec

Read full topic

item.title: New Coder Needs Noobish Help
item.dc:creator: @Simonrofl Simonrofl
item.description:
@Simonrofl wrote:

Search client.java or playerhandler.java for the emote name and find it.

Go into the data folder and open twohanded.dat and add the weapon in there that you want twohanded.

Read full topic

item.title: New Coder Needs Noobish Help
item.dc:creator: @dr4g0n_sc1m dr4g0n sc1m
item.description:
@dr4g0n_sc1m wrote:

Hey guys,
I’m new to coding and I just need a bit of help.

The things I need help with are
-You keep Firecape when you get killed by another player or npc
-Changing the Text on the teleport symbols - Fixed
-Getting rid of text in emote tab - Fixed
-Making 2h weapons can’t use shield
-Timers for my mage - Hopefully it will work on pvp
-Maul spec hits as soon as you click special bar
-Getting My teleports to work

My mage timers need to be slowed down.

I need some set by step code to keep firecape in inventory or kept equiped when somebody dies.

I’ll check back later. Night guys!

Read full topic
